name: Lumenstone Ore
desc: The raw ore from which Lumenstone may be found. If processed properly, it can be used to strengthen the Lumenstone Adjuvant you have. Why not hit Jinwu up and ask her?

customize.name: Lumenspar
customize.desc:
A sky-blue crystal that glitters so brightly that it brings forth echoes of the heavens above, which cannot be seen from underground...

If you hold it up to your ear, you can almost hear a soft sigh coming from within.

This might sound strange, but this crystal also gives off a faint warmth.

customize.text: are required to Enhance each level of the Lumenstone Adjuvant. Levels 2, 6, and 8 also each require 1

customize.name: Lumenstone Ore
customize.desc: The raw ore from which Lumenstone may be found. If processed properly, it can be used to strengthen the Lumenstone Adjuvant you have. Why not hit Jinwu up and ask her?

customize.text: . At each level additional capabilities will be granted.

<color=#ffffff>Level</color>
<color=#ffffff>Reward</color>
<color=#ffffff>Additional Capabilities</color>
<color=#ffffff>1</color>

customize.name: Fragile Resin
customize.desc:
An item used to restore Original Resin by 60 points.

This crystalline substance pulsates with a little energy that can be absorbed by Original Resin. The flow of energies of all sorts is the source of many wonders and challenges in the world. Those same energies are also contained within this crystal.

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.text: The maximum amount of energy that can be stored in the Lumenstone Adjuvant has been increased to 3.
<color=#ffffff>2</color>

customize.name: Acquaint Fate
customize.desc: A seed that lights up the night. No matter the distance apart, guided by the stone's glimmer, the fated will meet under the stars.

customize.text: Actively using the Lumenstone Adjuvant triggers Blooming Light, which consumes the energy stored within the Adjuvant to destroy nearby Level 1 Oozing Concretions. This can be used once every 4s.
<color=#ffffff>3</color>

customize.name: Philosophies of Prosperity
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity is unmatched and unobtainable by any other nations — it all belongs to Liyue and its inhabitants.

customize.name: Crown of Insight
customize.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.

customize.name: Northlander Billet Trove
customize.desc:
A precious strongbox that contains a billet filled with potential. It is capable of changing its shape to fit the wishes of its owner.

Use this item to choose one of the following items:

  • ・Northlander Sword Billet

  • ・Northlander Bow Billet

  • ・Northlander Claymore Billet

  • ・Northlander Catalyst Billet

  • ・Northlander Polearm Billet
